org.alien4cloud.server

Class MaintenanceModeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alien4cloud.server.MaintenanceModeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value={"/rest/maintenance","/rest/v1/maintenance","/rest/latest/maintenance"})
public class MaintenanceModeController
extends Object
    Controller to manage maintenance mode, enable, disable or get current maintenance task state.

      • get

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<org.alien4cloud.server.MaintenanceModeState> get()
        Get state on current maintenance task.
        Returns:
        A rest response that contains the current maintenance mode task if any or null.
